examples: Even though he's usually very timid and shy, my cat turns into a fierce protector when he's near his food bowl - every dog is valiant at his own door, as they say.

examples: Power companies usually measure energy usage in kilowatt hours.

examples: But utilitarians have other theories of punishment.

examples: And just like in most major galaxies, this black hole is currently quiescent.

words.defineEn: not active or activated

examples: The funeral pyres in makeshift crematoria now go 24/7, the final stop in a health care system that has crashed, unable to provide the most basic care that could have prevented most of these COVID deaths, hospital beds, equipment and, most critically, oxygen.

examples: He opted for lean ground turkey instead of beef for a healthier burger option.

words.defineVi: để chọn một cái gì đó trên một cái gì đó khác

examples: The bakery offered gluten-free options for customers with dietary restrictions.
